name: Fly Me To The
description:
It's been three weeks since the first Fly-lien appeared, people are still panicked and the galactic government has been as useless as usual. Unfortunately, we are on our own. As the bravest pilot in the system, you were recruited to help. You are brought into a large room with a bunch of important looking military officials and given a top secret briefing on the situation.

There seems to be no end to them. Wave after wave are pouring in from outside the solar system, and they have already destroyed all the satellites, ceasing our communication with the other planets On the ground, were safe, thanks to our powerful shielding technology. However, out there, its hell.  As a peaceful species, we don't have any weapons. We are researching a way to stop them, but we need our communication back up. That's where you come in.

Can you save the galaxy from the invading Fly-liens?

if you die its all over. Good luck captain.
